generated_responses.description: A list of strings corresponding to the earlier replies from the model.
generated_responses.title: Generated Responses

past_user_inputs.description: A list of strings corresponding to the earlier replies from the user. Should be of the same length of generated_responses.
past_user_inputs.instillShortDescription: A list of strings corresponding to the earlier replies from the user.
past_user_inputs.title: Past User Inputs

text.description: The last input from the user in the conversation.
text.title: Text

model.description: The Hugging Face model to be used
model.title: Model

use_cache.description: There is a cache layer on the inference API to speedup requests we have already seen. Most models can use those results as is as models are deterministic (meaning the results will be the same anyway). However if you use a non deterministic model, you can set this parameter to prevent the caching mechanism from being used resulting in a real new query.
use_cache.instillShortDescription: Enable the cache of inference API
use_cache.title: Use Cache

wait_for_model.description: If the model is not ready, wait for it instead of receiving 503. It limits the number of requests required to get your inference done. It is advised to only set this flag to true after receiving a 503 error as it will limit hanging in your application to known places.
wait_for_model.title: Wait For Model

max_length.description: Integer to define the maximum length in tokens of the output summary.
max_length.title: Max Length

max_time.description: The amount of time in seconds that the query should take maximum. Network can cause some overhead so it will be a soft limit.
max_time.instillShortDescription: The amount of time in seconds that the query should take maximum.
max_time.title: Max Time

min_length.description: Integer to define the minimum length in tokens of the output summary.
min_length.title: Min Length

repetition_penalty.description: The more a token is used within generation the more it is penalized to not be picked in successive generation passes.
repetition_penalty.title: Repetition Penalty

temperature.description: The temperature of the sampling operation. 1 means regular sampling, 0 means always take the highest score, 100.0 is getting closer to uniform probability.
temperature.instillShortDescription: The temperature of the sampling operation.
temperature.title: Temperature

top_k.description: Integer to define the top tokens considered within the sample operation to create new text.
top_k.title: Top K

top_p.description: Float to define the tokens that are within the sample operation of text generation. Add tokens in the sample for more probable to least probable until the sum of the probabilities is greater than top_p.
top_p.instillShortDescription: Float to define the tokens that are within the sample operation of text generation.
top_p.title: Top P
